title: Ending of AJC's Politically Georgia on WABE

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any emails or documents from Jan. 1st through March 1st, 2025 regariding the ending of the broadcasts of The AJC's Politically Georgia on WABE radio.

This would include any notice given, official termination of the broadcast agreement, and documents or emails about how both parties would handle the final airings and listener questions about end of the partnership between the Atlanta Journal-Constitution and WABE or the Atlanta Educational Telecommunications Collaborative.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brian Patrick Bannon

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: DEIA "Truth" emails
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of any email sent to DEIAtruth@opm.gov. Please include any attachments.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

title: DEIA Reports to Office of Personnel Management

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: DEIA Reports to Office of Personnel Management
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any email sent to DEIAreports@opm.gov between January 21, 2025, and January 31, 2025, inclusive. Please include a copy of any attachment.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh
